      • addStudent

        protected StudentQueueStatus addStudent​(Employee employee,
                                        Student student,
                                        StudentQueueStatus studentQueueStatus)
        Adds the given student to the given employee's queue
        Parameters:
        employee - employee to whose queue the student is to be added
        student - the student to be added
        studentQueueStatus - the current queue status of the student
        Returns:
        StudentQueueStatus

      • removeStudent

        protected StudentQueueStatus removeStudent​(String employeeId,
                                           String queueId,
                                           String studentId,
                                           boolean isFirst)
                                    throws InvalidRequestException
        Removes the given student from the given employee's queue
        Parameters:
        employeeId - id of the employee from whose queue the student is to be removed
        queueId - id of the queue to remove the student from
        studentId - id of the student to be removed
        isFirst - whether the student to be removed should be the first in the queue
        Returns:
        StudentQueueStatus
        Throws:
        InvalidRequestException - throws if the student is not present in the employee's queue or the student is not the first in queue if isFirst flag is set

      • removeQueue

        protected void removeQueue​(Employee employee,
                           boolean isEmpty)
        Removes the given employee's queue
        Parameters:
        employee - employee whose queue needs to be paused
        isEmpty - flag to assert that queue needs to be empty for successful operation

        Checks whether a queue is associated with the given employee
